name: detect-FAT
objective: detect of pluging a USB storage FAT formatted
description: plug a FAT formatted USB storage and check that it is detected
pre_condition: have an FAT formatted USB storage device
author: jb

name: detect-EXT4
objective: detect of pluging a USB storage EXT4 formatted
description: plug a EXT4 formatted USB storage and check that it is detected
pre_condition: have an EXT4 formatted USB storage device
author: jb

name: use-FAT
objective: can use a USB storage FAT formatted
description: plug a FAT formatted USB storage and check that it is useable
pre_condition: have an FAT formatted USB storage device
author: jb

name: use-EXT4
objective: can use a USB storage EXT4 formatted
description: plug a FAT formatted EXT4 storage and check that it is useable
pre_condition: have an EXT4 formatted USB storage device
author: jb
